TEXTS.ITEM: U1&FUNCTIONALITY& ASIs part of connector : ZAPLINK_BADI U1&RELATIONS& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS U1&HINTS& AS U1&FURTHER_SOURCES_OF_INF& AS U1Memories ASThis application is dedicated to the memories of : B2My father : Lamri BENSIALI (1940-2004) without whom I never started programming B2My uncle : Jacky BEDU (1934-2009) who died during the completion of this application

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY TYPE DECLARATIONS (CLASS *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* IMPLEMENTATION OR PRIVATE METHOD'S SIGNATURE
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* LOCAL CLASS IMPLEMENTATION FOR PUBLIC CLASS *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* LOCAL HELPER CLASSES
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY MACRO DEFINITIONS YOU NEED *"* IN THE IMPLEMENTATION PART OF THE CLASS

ITEM.TEXT: Convert FM Data to object attributes

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA s_impl LIKE LINE OF badi_implementations. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <impl> LIKE LINE OF data-impl_data.
a0_maindata = data-header. LOOP AT data-impl_data ASSIGNING <impl>. CLEAR s_impl. s_impl = <impl>. CLEAR: s_impl-spot_name. "s_impl-impl_name. * s_impl-IMPL_SHORTTEXT, s_impl-IMPL_SHORTTEXT_ID. INSERT s_impl INTO TABLE badi_implementations. ENDLOOP.

ITEM.TEXT: Convert object attributes to FM Data

TYPES.ITEM: begin of ts_badi_impl. include TYPE ENH_BADI_IMPL_DATA. types: END OF ts_badi_impl `
BEGIN OF ts_comp_enh_spot, name TYPE enhspotcompositename, zl_object TYPE to_raw, END OF ts_comp_enh_spot `
BEGIN OF ts_fm_data, header TYPE ts_header, impl_data TYPE ENH_BADI_IMPL_DATA_IT, * documentation TYPE tt_docs, END OF ts_fm_data `
BEGIN OF ts_header. INCLUDE TYPE enh_dy_spot. TYPES: spot_name TYPE enhspotname, END OF ts_header `
tt_badi_impls type SORTED TABLE OF ts_badi_impl WITH UNIQUE key impl_name `
